card.name: Mu Yanling, Seeing Wind
card.text: Whenver you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying. [+1]: Until end of turn, whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card. [-2]: Tap all creatures target player controls.

card.name: Conduit Mage
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Discard a card: This creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Unsettled Compass
card.text: When this artifact enters, if you cast it, discover 2. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 2 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

card.name: Tempest Angler
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, the owner of target spell or nonland permanent puts it on their choice of the top or bottom of their library.

card.name: Mismatch
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Islandcycling {1}. ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Phyrexian Scrap Searcher
card.text: ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.) You may hav ethis creature enter as a copy of any nonland artifact on the battlefield with mana value 2 or less.

card.name: Paradoxical Ritual
card.text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Exile any number of target artifacts you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of hte next end step. Draw a card for each card exiled this way.

card.name: Mizzium Micromancer
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, if you cast it, exile target artifact, instant, or sorcery card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard. Copy that card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Ancestral Ambition
card.text: Target player draws four cards, then discards three cards. Flashback {U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.

card.name: Lantern of Control
card.text: Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed. {T}: Target player mills a card.

card.name: Harbinger of Equilibrium
card.text: When this creature enters, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand. That creature's owner can't cast spells with the same name as that creature for as long as this creature remains on the battlefield

card.name: Arcane Tutor
card.text: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Exile Arcane Tutor.

card.name: Force of Tenacity
card.text: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target artifact, instant, or sorcery spell.

card.name: Aqueous Bauble
card.text: When this artifact enters or leaves the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.) {1}, Sacrifice this artifact: draw a card.

card.name: Emry, Inquisitive Lurker
card.text: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. Whenver you discard one or more artifact cards, choose one - • Create a Clue token. • Create a treasure token. • Create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Sword with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}.

card.name: Bauble Mage
card.text: When this creature enters, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 0, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Memory Spike
card.text: Look at target player's hand. Draw a card, then fateseal 3. (To fateseal 3, look at the top three cards of an opponent’s library, then put any number of them on the bottom of that player’s library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Astral Epiphany
card.text: Draw three cards, then discard two cards. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card type among cards discarded this way.

card.name: Travelling Thaumaturge
card.text: When this creature enters, copy the next spell you cast this turn when you cast it. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

card.name: Deepcoral Guardian
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may sacrifice this creature. If you do, reveal the top card of your library, counter that spell if it has the same mana value as the revealed card. {2}: Scry 2.

card.name: Spectral Captain
Jin-Gitaxias, Matter Shaper
card.text: Flash When Jin-Gitaxias enters, draw seven cards. Discard a card: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Disparage
card.text: Buyback - Pay 3 life, Discard two cards. (You may pay 3 life and discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.

card.name: Swept Away
card.text: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) Return target nonland permanent to its owenr's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

card.name: Depth
card.text: Flash Skulk When this creature enters, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. Evoke - Exile a blue card from your hand.

card.name: Dreamcoil Despot
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, if you cast it, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards. Dash {3}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it’s returned from the battlefield to its owner’s hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

card.name: Perpend
card.text: Look at the top two cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle. Draw a card.

card.name: Forgetful Fish
card.text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls and Island.) Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) When you control no Islands, sacrifice this creature.

card.name: Fatefall Malestrom
card.text: Take an extra turn after this one. Flashback {9}{U}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Contrasurveil
Ethereal Companions
card.text: When this creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it. Spells you cast cost {U} (or {1}) less to cast.

card.name: Memory Severance
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. {2}{U}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Momentum Weaver
card.text: This creature can't be blocked. Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Exile a spell you control: Draw a card.

card.name: Prismatic Fissure
card.text: Converge - Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each color of mana spent to cast this spell.
